meanings.definition: To format (something, such as a computer disk) again.
meanings.sent1: I am reformatting my computer to make it run faster.
meanings.sent2: She is reformatting the USB drive to erase all the data.
meanings.sent3: After accidentally deleting everything, reformatting the disk became a weekly ritual.
meanings.sent4: Reformatting my life felt like starting over with a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The technician explained reformatting as giving the computer a fresh start.

meanings.definition: The act or process of reformatting something.
meanings.sent1: The reformatting of the document made it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: We had to do a complete reformatting of the hard drive.
meanings.sent3: The reformatting of the presentation turned it into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her reformatting skills were unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent5: The reformatting of the room transformed it into a cozy space.
